nodes.text: An asteroid mine was used as the location of a slavery operation. A group of Letaki were at the mine, circa 2 ABY. The Letaki were approached by the Human pirate Alia Terae, whom they told about the slave trade that passed through the asteroid and the path through the mine's tunnels to reach the slave holding pens. Terae then led her companions, Han Solo and the Human pilot Sian Tesar, per the Letaki's instructions.
